sentences.en: A mackerel sky and mares'tails make lofty ships carry low sails.
sentences.cn: 鱼鳞天,马尾云,大船降帆莫航行.

sentences.en: A statesman should be animated by lofty sentiments.
sentences.cn: 政治家应当焕发出崇高的情操.

sentences.en: He has a lofty position in the firm.
He stayed at the Four Seasons Hotel, from whose lofty heights he could see across New York.
sentences.cn: 他住在四季酒店，从酒店高处可以看到纽约的全景。

sentences.en: I didn't like her lofty treatment of her visitors.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢她那样傲慢地对待来访者.

sentences.en: It was a bank that started out with grand ideas and lofty ideals.
sentences.cn: 这是一家创办伊始抱有雄心壮志的银行。

sentences.en: Lofty derricks dot the landscape in an oil field.
sentences.cn: 高耸的井架点缀着油田的景色.

sentences.en: lofty ideals of equality and social justice
sentences.cn: 平等和社会正义的崇高理想

sentences.en: The lofty mountains were crowned with snow.
The lofty pagoda stands like a giant at the top of the mountain.
The lofty peaks tower into the clouds.
The lofty walls of the castle seemed impregnable.
sentences.cn: 这座城堡的高墙似乎坚不可摧.

sentences.en: The room was light and lofty compared with our Tudor ones.
sentences.cn: 跟我们都铎风格的房间比起来，这个房间显得素雅而大气。

sentences.en: The youth of our country have [ has ] lofty ideals.
sentences.cn: 我国的青年有 崇高 的理想.

sentences.en: Victorian houses can seem cold with their lofty ceilings and rambling rooms.
sentences.cn: 维多利亚式房屋屋顶高耸，房间布局凌乱，因此可能会显得较为阴冷。

sentences.en: Young people should have lofty ideals and aims.
sentences.cn: 年轻人应该有崇高的理想和目标.

trans.tran_cn: 高耸的，巍峨的，高尚的，傲慢的
trans.tran_en: lofty mountains, buildings etc are very high and impressive
